title: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch

They might also be wondering how this episode can be streamed online. In the previous episode, “Through the Valley,” Jackson Hole’s residents geared up and […] The post The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Fans curious about The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3's release date, time, and streaming details can find out more here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 release date and time are just around the corner, and viewers and fans of the series are keen on learning the details. They might also be wondering how this episode can be streamed online. In the previous episode, “Through the Valley,” Jackson Hole’s residents geared up and prepared for increased sightings of infected, amidst a storm plaguing the mountains. Meanwhile, Abby was dealing with options pertaining to her vendetta against Joel. Here’s all you need to know. When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 release date & time? The episode’s release date is April 27, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT). Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeApril 27, 202509:00 p.m.Pacific TimeApril 27, 202506:00 p.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2, right here. Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 via HBO and HBO Max. HBO and HBO Max are a pay television service and subscription-based OTT platform owned and operated by Warner Bros. Discovery. The platform offers subscribers a wide variety of film, television, animation, and documentary content. Moreover, Max also provides subscribers with content taken from other WB Discovery-owned networks like Adult Swim and Animal Planet. What is The Last of Us about? The Last of Us Season 2 is based on Naughty Dog and Sony’s The Last of Us Part II video game. The story takes place five years after the events of the first season, which was based on the original The Last of Us game. The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows: “Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
html:
The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 release date and time are just around the corner, and viewers and fans of the series are keen on learning the details. They might also be wondering how this episode can be streamed online. In the previous episode, “Through the Valley,” Jackson Hole’s residents geared up and prepared for increased sightings of infected, amidst a storm plaguing the mountains. Meanwhile, Abby was dealing with options pertaining to her vendetta against Joel.

Here’s all you need to know.

When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is April 27, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT).

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2, right here.

Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3

You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 3 via HBO and HBO Max.

HBO and HBO Max are a pay television service and subscription-based OTT platform owned and operated by Warner Bros. Discovery. The platform offers subscribers a wide variety of film, television, animation, and documentary content.

Moreover, Max also provides subscribers with content taken from other WB Discovery-owned networks like Adult Swim and Animal Planet.

What is The Last of Us about?

The Last of Us Season 2 is based on Naughty Dog and Sony’s The Last of Us Part II video game. The story takes place five years after the events of the first season, which was based on the original The Last of Us game.

The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows:

“Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
